00014 // standard include files
00015 #include <stdio.h>
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include <time.h>
00018 
00019 // project include files
00020 #include "common.h"
00021 #include "query.h"
00022 
00023 int main (int argc, char * argv []) {
00024     Query q1;
00025     clock_t t1, t2;
00026     Wave w1;
00027     short * waveData;
00028 
00029     t1 = clock ();
00030     w1.waveRead(argv [1]);
00031     waveData = (short *) calloc (w1.getNumChannels() * w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), sizeof (short));
00032     w1.waveLoad(0, w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), waveData);
00033     w1.waveDownmix(waveData, waveData);
00034     q1.query (waveData, w1.getSampleRate (), w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), 250);
00035     t2 = clock ();
00036     printf ("Time for executing query (%s) was %5.3f seconds", argv [1], ((double)t2 - (double)t1) / (double)CLK_TCK);
00037 }
